text: Start and end your day with God. Affirm your identity as His precious son and daughter. What does it mean to be God's child?
Make your struggles the stepping stones for your growth and future victories. Embrace and celebrate the challenges.
In your choices and actions, ask: Is God at the center? Am I prioritizing the greater good before myself? What is the right thing to do?
Do not compare. God made you unique. Your course is a special story between you and God. Always look up and out.
Be sincere. Let your efforts be motivated by love for God and your desire to do more for others: your family, your future spouse, your greater global family.
